import React, {useEffect} from 'react'; import {Link, useHistory} from "react-router-dom"; import Map from "./map"; import {useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux"; import {updateFilter} from "../actions/productActions"; export default function Footer(props) { const {categories} = useSelector((state) => state.categoryList.categories); const dispatch = useDispatch(); let history = useHistory(); useEffect(() => { console.log(categories); }, [categories]); const goToCategory = (category) => { dispatch(updateFilter({'Kategorija': category.name})); history.push(`/kategorija/${category._id}`); } return

Glanve kategorije

    {categories?.length ? categories.map(item => { return goToCategory(item)}>
  • {item.name}
    •  }) : ''}
